intro.heading: Keep Growing, Keep Achieving
intro.paragraph: Whether you're upskilling for work, launching a side hustle, or exploring something new, your EPL card gives you access to premium online courses, career resources, and creative tools—all at no cost.
intro.second_paragraph: Take your learning further with expert-led content and endless opportunities to grow.

access.heading: Get Instant Access!
access.paragraph: Your EPL card is your key to endless learning. Last year, Edmontonians borrowed 11 million items using their library card. With your card, you can:
list: Access thousands of businesses, tech, and creative courses on LinkedIn Learning.
Master a new skill by accessing our studio labs, sound recording studios, and more.
Get certified in services like 3D printing, sewing, or vinyl cutting.
Join book clubs, attend thought-provoking speaker series, and explore new perspectives.
Watch inspiring films that challenge and expand your thinking.
Find the perfect space to research, study, or collaborate with like-minded learners.

customerStories.heading: Customer Stories
customerStories.quote: EPL is a great place to get 'things' done. I can keep in touch with friends on Facebook, check my emails, take free courses to upgrade my skills to add to my resume. I also have a lot of fun downloading recipes to cook at home.
customerStories.author: Lorraine C.

whyGetEPLCard.heading: Why Get an EPL Card?
whyGetEPLCard.paragraph: Unlock a world of knowledge with your EPL card. Access top learning resources, expert-led courses, and more anytime, anywhere!

card1.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card1.content: Gain in-demand skills with thousands of expert-led courses covering business, technology, and creative topics. Whether you're looking to advance your career or pick up a new hobby, your EPL card gives you free access to top-tier training.

card2.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card2.content: Take your learning further with instructor-led online courses on everything from professional development and business to creative writing and personal wellness. Learn at your own pace with engaging, interactive lessons.

card3.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card3.content: Get access to over 45,000 eBooks and 3,500+ videos on technology and business. Get instant access—no downloads or checkouts needed!

card4.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card4.content: Take the next step in your career with powerful tools for job searching, resume building, and skill development. Find career resources to help you succeed in the workplace and beyond.

questions.title: Do I need a library card to access online learning resources?
questions.text: Yes, you need an active EPL card to access all library resources. You must be an Edmonton resident to qualify. Sign up today!

questions.title: Do I need a special app or software to access EPL’s online learning resources?
questions.text: No special app or software is required. You can access EPL’s online learning resources directly from our website. Simply click on the resource you’d like to use, log in with your EPL card, and start learning.

questions.title: What do I need to get an EPL card?
questions.text:
Getting your EPL card is simple. Visit any EPL location with indentification (Drivers’ License, Alberta Health Care Card, etc.) and proof of Edmonton address in hand or signup online for a 45-day temporary card to start experiencing some of the benefits of EPL membership before visiting a branch to get a full membership.

If you're under 18, your parent or guardian must sign for you, and they'll be responsible for what you borrow.
